title: The heritage lists which have been approved by the Government before coming into force these regulations, shall remain valid and shall be the part of these regulations
clause_text: The heritage lists which have been approved by the Government before coming into force these regulations, shall remain valid and shall be the part of these regulations.
section: Preparation of List of Heritage Buildings, Heritage Precincts and Natural Features
